info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 3:24PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN MCDOWELL... CALDWELL...SOUTHEASTERN AVERY AND NORTHWESTERN BURKE COUNTIES THROUGH 400 PM EDT... At 324 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Newland, or near Linville Falls, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lenoir, Gamewell, Blowing Rock In Caldwell County, Cedar Rock, Crossnore, Grandfather Mountain State Park, Table Rock, Linville Falls, B.R. Parkway-Linville Falls To Grandfather, and Edgemont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
